statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT area_name, air_quality_level FROM environmental_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT id, area_name FROM environmental_data ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE air_quality_level BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM environmental_data WHERE air_quality_level < 20;
SELECT id, area_name, air_quality_level, pollution_level FROM environmental_data WHERE air_quality_level > 50 ORDER BY area_name ASC, pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY pollution_level ASC, area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM environmental_data GROUP BY area_name HAVING total_records > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, air_quality_level, pollution_level FROM environmental_data WHERE area_name LIKE 'Central%' ORDER BY air_quality_level DESC, area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE air_quality_level >= 80 AND pollution_level <= 30 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, air_quality_index FROM AirQualityData WHERE air_quality_index > 50;
SELECT MAX(air_quality_index) FROM AirQualityData;
SELECT data_id, location_id, pollution_level FROM PollutionData WHERE location_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) FROM PollutionData;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE air_quality_index > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT data_id, location_id, air_quality_index, timestamp FROM AirQualityData WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY air_quality_index ASC;

SELECT AQD.location_id, AQD.timestamp, PD.pollution_level FROM AirQualityData AS AQD JOIN PollutionData AS PD ON AQD.location_id = PD.location_id WHERE AQD.air_quality_index > 50 AND PD.pollution_level < 1.0 ORDER BY AQD.timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(air_quality_index) AS avg_air_quality_index, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM AirQualityData JOIN PollutionData ON AirQualityData.location_id = PollutionData.location_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE air_quality_index > (SELECT AVG(air_quality_index) FROM AirQualityData) ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, region FROM city_info WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM city_info JOIN sensor_data ON city_info.city_id = sensor_data.city_id;
SELECT city_name, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM city_info JOIN sensor_data ON city_info.city_id = sensor_data.city_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT city_name, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM city_info JOIN sensor_data ON city_info.city_id = sensor_data.city_id ORDER BY sensor_reading DESC;
SELECT city_id, timestamp, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT city_name, region, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM city_info INNER JOIN sensor_data ON city_info.city_id = sensor_data.city_id WHERE sensor_type = 'CO2' AND sensor_reading > 100 ORDER BY city_name ASC, sensor_reading DESC

SELECT city_name, region, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM city_info INNER JOIN sensor_data ON city_info.city_id = sensor_data.city_id WHERE sensor_type = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY region ASC, sensor_reading ASC

SELECT city_name, region, pollution_level, air_quality_index FROM city_info INNER JOIN air_quality_data ON city_info.city_id = air_quality_data.city_id WHERE pollution_level < 30 ORDER BY air_quality_index DESC, pollution_level ASC
SELECT city_id, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%' ORDER BY city_id ASC, sensor_reading DESC
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT id, area_name, temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT area_name, pollution_type, pollution_level FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT id, area_name, population FROM city_areas WHERE geographical_location LIKE '%north%' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT area_name, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE humidity < 40;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_areas WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT source_name, pollution_type, pollution_level FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 25 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, timestamp, pollution_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT area_name, city_name FROM Location WHERE city_name = 'New York'
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT location_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData
SELECT location_id, timestamp, pollution_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT area_name, city_name FROM Location WHERE city_name = 'New York'
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial'
SELECT location_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, timestamp, pollution_level FROM PollutionLevels WHERE location_id = 1001
